cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 9th Nov 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 9th Nov 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
A/C Ceiling fan, multiple power points, and a private bathroom. Includes linen (quilts, extra pillows, and towels), as well as a full-length mirror, under-bed storage, and clothes hanging space.
Hairdryers or hair straighteners are available upon request

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Room Size 32 mÂ²

This large dormitory room features A/C ceiling fan, multiple power points and a private bathroom.

Bed linen is provided; please note that you must bring your own towels. Towels may be available upon request subject to availability.

privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room that sleeps 2 people, inside a 2 bedroom apartment. Each bedroom is private, both rooms share the kitchen, bathroom, and lounge.
